SETTING.NAME: Presentation Title
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter a title for this presentation.

SETTING.NAME: Date/Time
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter the date/time of this presentation. (ie: 5/1/2009 12:00 PM)

SETTING.NAME: Speaker Name
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter the name(s) of the speaker(s).

SETTING.NAME: Description
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter a description for this presentation.

SETTING.NAME: Email Address
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter an email address where emails should be sent. Leave blank to remove email option.

SETTING.NAME: Video Aspect
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter the video aspect mode: standard or widescreen. Unknown value sets standard mode.

SETTING.NAME: Presentation Layout
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Layout modes: default, swapped, videoright, noslide, largevideo, onlyvideo. Unknown value sets default mode.

SETTING.NAME: Topics Tab
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter 'yes' to show the Topics tab.

SETTING.NAME: Enable Audio-Only Mode
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter 'yes' to enable audio-only mode.

SETTING.NAME: Audio-Only Overlay Image
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Select an image (JPG or PNG only) for the audio-only template. Image size: 320 x 240 (ST) or 320 x 180 (WS)

SETTING.NAME: Template Background Image
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Select a background image to use in the template. Image size: 997 x 624

SETTING.NAME: Template Logo Image
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Select a logo image to use in the template. Image size: 997 x 61

SETTING.NAME: Launch Background Image
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Select a background image to use in the launch page. Image size: 700 x 500

SETTING.NAME: Launch Logo Image
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Select a logo image to use in the launch page. Image size: 700 x 75

SETTING.NAME: Header Title Color
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter a valid hex value for the color of the header title and indicator. Enter 'none' to hide the title.

SETTING.NAME: Thumbnails Pagination
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter the number of thumbnails displayed in each page. Enter zero (0) to remove pagination or leave blank to hide.

SETTING.NAME: Copyright
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter your copyright message. (ie: Copyright Your Company 2009)

SETTING.NAME: Closed Captioning
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter 'yes' to enable closed captioning.

SETTING.NAME: Resource File 1 Title
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter a name for this resource file.

SETTING.NAME: Resource File 1
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Select a file to make available for download from the Resources tab.

SETTING.NAME: Resource File 2 Title
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter a name for this resource file.

SETTING.NAME: Resource File 2
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Select a file to make available for download from the Resources tab.

SETTING.NAME: Resource File 3 Title
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter a name for this resource file.

SETTING.NAME: Resource File 3
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Select a file to make available for download from the Resources tab.

SETTING.NAME: Resource Link 1 Title
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter a name for this resource link.

SETTING.NAME: Resource Link 1
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter an external URL link (ie: http://www.accordent.com) to be displayed in the Resources tab.

SETTING.NAME: Resource Link 2 Title
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter a name for this resource link.

SETTING.NAME: Resource Link 2
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter an external URL link (ie: http://www.accordent.com) to be displayed in the Resources tab.

SETTING.NAME: Resource Link 3 Title
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter a name for this resource link.

SETTING.NAME: Resource Link 3
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter an external URL link (ie: http://www.accordent.com) to be displayed in the Resources tab.

SETTING.NAME: Require AMMS
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Enter 'yes' to force the presentation to be launched from AMMS (requires AMMS v3 or higher)

SETTING.NAME: External Event ID
SETTING.DESCRIPTION: Please enter the External Event ID (if available) associated with the presentation
